wikipedia_page.main: Gemma Lavender (born 13 September 1986) is a British astronomer, author and journalist. She currently serves as the editor of All About Space, a monthly scientific magazine owned by British publisher Future plc. Lavender was also the Editor in Chief of Future plc's science portfolio before announcing that she would be stepping into the role of Content Director of Knowledge and Education in October 2021.  She has authored books on quantum physics, astronomy and astrophysics.

response: * Gemma Lavender, astronomer, journalist and author, born in Chatham in 1986
